align.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to publicly support a political group, country, or person that you agree with
align.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: a country closely aligned with the West
Church leaders have aligned themselves with the opposition.
align.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to arrange things so that they form a line or are parallel to each other, or to be in a position that forms a line etc
align.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The desks were neatly aligned in rows.
Make sure that all the holes align.
align.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: to organize or change something so that it has the right relationship to something else
align.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: This policy is closely aligned with the goals of the organization.
align.translation[0].definitions[2].note: Align  is usually passive in this meaning
